newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Orion Network Systems a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Orion Network Systems a buy.

text.p: -- Rauscher Pierce Refsnes Inc said Friday it initiated coverage of Orion Network Systems Inc with a buy-focus rating and a 12-month price target of $16 in part because of the company's entrance in the Asian market.

-- Orion is currently operating one satellite and plans to launch another two by the end of 1999, Rauscher said. The move will give Orion the capability of providing satellite communications services to an estimated 85 percent of the world's population, Rauscher said.
-- Orion will be able to achieve EBITDA margins of more than 60 percent using three satellites, Rauscher said.
-- Orion shares closed unchanged Friday at 9-1/2.
